https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/tzONwMJgfOw06MXKi4NLQttkaW8.jpg Ahilyabai was born on May 31, 1725 in the village of Chaundi, in the present-day Ahmednagar district in Maharashtra. Her father, Mankoji Shinde, was the patil of the village, a member of the proud Dhangar community. Women then did not go to school, but Ahilyabai's father taught her to read and write. Devi Ahilya Bai
